common_1050_botan_01:
Hah...hah... I think I might’ve died once or twice
there...[npcn:8]
common_1050_botan_02: It...chose to go back into its ball?[npcn:8]
common_1050_friend_02: It’s probably just hungry or something.[npcn:6]
common_1050_friend_04: Wait a second—where’s the student council girl?![npcn:6]
common_1050_botan_04: Wha—? She’s gone! You don’t think she...?[npcn:8]
common_1050_rival_01: E-everyone! You have to see this![npcn:4]
common_1050_botan_05: I guess your Ability would be Own Tempo, huh...[npcn:8]
common_1050_hakase_01a:
Biometric identification in progress...
Four humans identified. Condition satisfactory.\r
Vital signs all within normal range.[npcn:B]
common_1050_hakase_01b:
Biometric identification in progress...
Four humans identified. Condition satisfactory.\r
Vital signs all within normal range.[npcn:E]
common_1050_hakase_02a:
It appears you were able to make the descent
without being harmed.[npcn:B]
common_1050_hakase_02b:
It appears you were able to make the descent
without being harmed.[npcn:E]
common_1050_friend_05:
Hah, yeah, sure! Smooth sailing! Who could
possibly complain about a landing like that?[npcn:6]
common_1050_hakase_04a:
I had concerns you might fail, given the crudeness
of the only available access method.[npcn:B]
common_1050_hakase_04b:
I had concerns you might fail, given the crudeness
of the only available access method.[npcn:E]
common_1050_botan_06:
I think your [mom;dad:gs]’s sarcasm detector
needs fixing...[npcn:8]
common_1050_rival_03: Aw, you were worried about us? That’s so sweet![npcn:4]
common_1050_hakase_05a:
You should now make your way to me at the
Zero Lab, in the deepest part of Area Zero.\r
However...[npcn:B]
common_1050_hakase_05b:
You should now make your way to me at the
Zero Lab, in the deepest part of Area Zero.\r
However...[npcn:E]
common_1050_hakase_06a:
the entrance to the lab is barred by four locks,
installed on the exterior, which I cannot unlock.[npcn:B]
common_1050_hakase_06b:
the entrance to the lab is barred by four locks,
installed on the exterior, which I cannot unlock.[npcn:E]
common_1050_hakase_07a:
On your way to me, you must visit four research
stations that were constructed inside the crater.[npcn:B]
common_1050_hakase_07b:
On your way to me, you must visit four research
stations that were constructed inside the crater.[npcn:E]
common_1050_hakase_08a:
At each station, you will be able to disable one
of the locks. Do so as you make your way down.[npcn:B]
common_1050_hakase_08b:
At each station, you will be able to disable one
of the locks. Do so as you make your way down.[npcn:E]
common_1050_rival_04:
Yesss! Let’s disable the four locks and get into
that lab!\c
Sounds kinda video-gamey when you say it out
loud, huh?[npcn:4]
common_1050_rival_07:
Come on, time to find our way to the deepest
part of Area Zero![npcn:4]
